mainMenu module

Main menu UI and helper functions.

Main menu implementation for Number Tycoon.

This module provides the MainMenu class which renders the game’s main menu, handles input and launches or resumes games by creating a gameManager.GameManager instance. The implementation uses pygame surfaces and draws a custom cursor to match the in-game UI.

Only documentation strings are added to support Sphinx; behavior is unchanged.

class mainMenu.MainMenu(screen)

Main menu controller.

Public methods: - draw(): render the menu to the screen - update(): tick the menu clock - handle_events(): process pygame events - start_game(new=False): start a GameManager instance

confirm_delete_save()

Muestra un diálogo modal simple preguntando si borrar la partida anterior. Devuelve True si confirma, False si cancela.

load_save()
